name: Business Trip [GAME JAM VERSION]
description:
Play as a casual business man working for a video game business just trying to get on work in time. Until you realize your stuck in a simulation by your own company! They are recording your thoughts and use them as footage for their next big video game! Can you escape?

Entry for Brakey's 2022.1 Game Jam

Theme:"It is not real"

Made by a 12 year old in one week.
